name: Big bot Bustout!
description:
Controls: 

WASD or Arrow keys: Move your robot

Space bar: Send robots forward. 

Send robots into Cages to free your friends, then gather them all and exit the stage to progress.

Everything but the music was created by hand.

Music/sounds:
